channel.title: Video on SeeHisFace
channel.description: Recent content in Video on SeeHisFace

item.title: The Chosen
item.description: I have just finished watching the first series of The Chosen. Created by Dallas Jenkins, a Christian and a director, writer and film producer, the show is already The highest crowd-funded TV series or film of all time. The following is from their site and pretty much sums up what it is about: The Chosen is the first-ever-multi-season TV show about the life of Jesus. Created outside of the Hollywood system, The Chosen allows us to see Him through the eyes of those who knew him.

item.title: The Forbidden Chapter Isaiah 53
item.description:
Today I came across Tree of Life Ministries, and specifically this really great demonstration of using Isaiah 53 in preaching to Jews.

Seemingly most are not even aware of what the chapter says, let alone who it is actually talking about!

item.title: An Old William Lane Craig Debate
item.description:
Whilst browsing at some William Lane Craig videos yesterday, I came across this debate that I had not seen before.

It is from 1998 and he is debating with Dr. Keith Parsons, a Professor of Philosophy and a non-believer.
